backend/main.mo: Actor managing user profiles, voice models, and conversion jobs with access control and blob storage integration.
feature_evidence.json: Feature report mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of major frontend files and components.
frontend/.env: Environment file defining the Replicate API token used in development.
frontend/.env.example: Template environment file showing where to place a Replicate API token.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind base styles defining warm OKLCH color tokens and dark mode variants.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React root and loading the main TypeScript entry file.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router, theme provider, and root application routes.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Page layout wrapper including navigation, main content container, and footer.
frontend/src/components/AppNav.tsx: Responsive navigation bar with links, icons, brand logo, and login controls.
frontend/src/components/AudioUploadAndSu: Audio upload and submission form that validates Replicate token usage and triggers voice conversion jobs.
frontend/src/components/AuthGate.tsx: Wraps children and prompts for Internet Identity login with loading and auth states.
frontend/src/components/EmptyStateHero.t: Shows a centered empty-state section with optional image, title, description, and action.
frontend/src/components/InlineAlert.tsx: Renders a small inline alert box with variant-based colors and icons.
frontend/src/components/JobsTable.tsx: Fetches and displays a grid of job status cards sorted by creation time.
frontend/src/components/JobStatusCard.ts: Displays a conversion job’s status, preview playback, and download controls with error handling.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Button that handles Internet Identity login/logout with loading states.
frontend/src/components/ModelSelect.tsx: Dropdown for selecting a voice model, handling loading and empty states.
frontend/src/components/ReplicateTokenCa: Manages Replicate API token entry, validation, saving, and clearing within a settings card.
Displays the user's uploaded voice models with delete functionality and loading skeletons.
frontend/src/components/VoiceModelUpload: Form for uploading voice models with fields, file handling, progress, and mutation integration.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor instance, refreshing dependents when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useConversionJobs.ts: Provides hooks to fetch, create, and monitor voice conversion jobs using the backend actor and Replicate API.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity authentication state, login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useModelNameLookup.ts: Returns a helper to look up a model's name by ID using fetched voice models.
frontend/src/hooks/useReplicateToken.ts: Tracks and updates the saved Replicate API token via subscription.
frontend/src/hooks/useVoiceModels.ts: Provides hooks to fetch, upload, and delete voice models via the backend actor with query invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and theme variables for light and dark mode.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/CreateCoverPage.tsx: Page for uploading audio and selecting a model to create AI covers, redirecting users without models.
frontend/src/pages/JobsHistoryPage.tsx: Shows the user's conversion job history or an empty state with navigation to create a new cover.
frontend/src/pages/VoiceModelsPage.tsx: Renders the voice models page with upload form, list, and empty state using data from useGetVoiceModels.
frontend/src/services/replicateToken.ts: Manages Replicate API token persistence in localStorage and notifies subscribers on changes.
frontend/src/services/replicateValidatio: Validates a Replicate API token by making a lightweight request and returns a structured result.
frontend/src/services/voiceConversion.ts: Handles client-side voice conversion via Replicate API, including token resolution, audio encoding, and error normalization.
frontend/src/utils/actorErrorMessage.ts: Extracts readable error messages from backend or agent errors by stripping common prefixes.
Downloads an ExternalBlob as an audio file by converting bytes into a Blob and triggering a browser download.
frontend/src/utils/fileToBytes.ts: Converts a File to a Uint8Array with size validation and FileReader handling.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters for routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS theme, colors, typography, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, existing features, pending requests, and project configuration state.
